summary: The Xbox One is a video game console made by Microsoft. It came out in 2013 as the follow-up to the Xbox 360. With a new controller and features like voice commands and sharing gameplay, it was promoted as an "all-in-one entertainment system." It competed with Sony's PlayStation 4 and Nintendo's consoles. The Xbox One has a powerful processor and can play Blu-ray discs and stream TV. It received good reviews for its controller and multimedia abilities but was criticized for having lower graphics than the PS4. Later, it was updated to the Xbox One S and Xbox One X models, offering better visuals and 4K support.
title: Xbox One
